# alternateRegion

**Instance Property**

A region that location services can monitor more effectively.

## Declaration

```swift
var alternateRegion: CLRegion? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property has a value only for errors of type [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLError-swift.struct/regionMonitoringResponseDelayed].
